entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
